---
id: Query_historical_orders
title: Query Historical Orders
sidebar_label: Query Historical Orders
sidebar_position: 9
description: /spot/v4/history-order
---

**Type:** GET

**Description:** `/spot/v4/history-order`

#### Limit Flow Rules

10/s/apikey

### Parameters

| Name | Type | Mandatory | Default | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `symbol` | string | No |  | Trading pair, if not filled in, represents all |
| `bizType` | string | No |  | SPOT, LEVER |
| `side` | string | No |  | BUY, SELL |
| `type` | string | No |  | LIMIT, MARKET |
| `state` | string | No |  | Order [state](#orderStatus), PARTIALLY_FILLED, FILLED, CANCELED, REJECTED, EXPIRED |
| `fromId` | number | No |  | Start ID |
| `direction` | string | No |  | Query direction: PREV, NEXT |
| `limit` | number | No | 20 | Limit number, max 100 |
| `startTime` | number | No |  | Example: 1657682804112 |
| `endTime` | number | No |  | End time |
| `hiddenCanceled` | boolean | No |  | Whether to hide canceled orders |

### Response Example

```json title="Response"
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {
    "hasPrev": true,
    "hasNext": true,
    "items": [
      {
        "symbol": "BTC_USDT",
        "orderId": "6216559590087220004",
        "clientOrderId": "16559590087220001",
        "baseCurrency": "string",
        "quoteCurrency": "string",
        "side": "BUY",
        "type": "LIMIT",
        "timeInForce": "GTC",
        "price": "40000",
        "origQty": "2",
        "origQuoteQty": "48000",
        "executedQty": "1.2",
        "leavingQty": "string",
        "tradeBase": "2",
        "tradeQuote": "48000",
        "avgPrice": "42350",
        "fee": "string",
        "feeCurrency": "string",
        "state": "NEW",
        "time": 1655958915583,
        "updatedTime": 1655958915583
      }
    ]
  }
}
```
